quote_first: And then I woke up because there were people shouting in the flat and it was
quote_last: And one of the people was Father and I was frightened.
quote_raw: And then I woke up because there were people shouting in the flat and it was 2.31 a.m. And one of the people was Father and I was frightened.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
